Subject: Football
data: 1 Which Country is the winner of FIFA World Cup 2014? A Brazil B Argentina C Germany D Netherlands Answer: Option [C]
2 Who was the winner of Golden Ball award in the FIFA World Cup 2014? A Thomas Muller B Lionel Messi C Neymar Jr D Ronaldo Answer: Option [B]
3 Who was the winner of the Silver Ball in the FIFA World Cup 2014? A Miroslav Klose B Arjen Robben C Thomas Muller D Mesut Ozil Answer: Option [C]
4 Who was the winner of the Bronze Ball in the FIFA World Cup 2014? A Bastian Schweinsteiger B Mesut Ozil C Wesley Sneijder D Arjen Robben Answer: Option [D]
5 Who was the winner of the Golden Boot in the FIFA World Cup 2014? A James Rodríguez B Fernando Torres C David Villa D Wayne Rooney Answer: Option [A]
6 What is the name of the venue where the FIFA World Cup 2014 final match was played? A Estadio das Dunas B Estadio Do Maracana C Arena Pantanal D Arena de Sao Paulo Answer: Option [B]
7 Who was the winner of Golden Glove award in the FIFA World Cup 2014 ? A Sergio Romario B Karim Benzema C Manuel Neuer D Lionel Messi Answer: Option [C]
8 What is the name of football in FIFA World Cup 2014? A Telstar B Brazuca C Teamgeist D Jabulani Answer: Option [B]
9 Which country ranked in the third place in FIFA world cup 2014? A Brazil B Italy C Netherlands D France Answer: Option [C]
10 Who was the winner of Hyundai Young Player award in FIFA World Cup 2014? A Paul Pogba B Wayne Rooneys C David Villa D Mario Balotelli Answer: Option [A]
11 Where the final match of the FIFA World Cup 2014 was played? A Mineirao Stadium B Maracanã Stadium C Arena de São Paulo D Estádio Nacional de Brasilia Answer: Option [B]
12 Who sang the theme song of FIFA World Cup 2014? A Pitbull and Jennifer Lopez B Kesha Rose Sebert C Lady Gaga D Enrique Iglesias Answer: Option [A]
13 How many goals scored in world cup 2014? A 160 B 167 C 171 D 175 Answer: Option [C]
14 Who scored the highest individual goals in FIFA World Cup 2014? A james rodriguez B Mesut Ozil C Bastian Schweinsteiger D Arjen Robben Answer: Option [A]
15 Who scored the only goal in the final of FIFA World Cup 2014? A Mario Gotze B Fernando Torres C David Villa D Miroslav Klose Answer: Option [A]
